task: Implement Hour 7-8 enhanced cancellation support and advanced progress tracking for iPhone App command queue

deliverables.description: Multi-select state management, confirmation dialogs, undo operations
features: Edit mode state with selection tracking

deliverables.description: Enhanced command row with multi-select and detailed progress
features: Enhanced progress visualization with execution phases
Detailed progress info with sub-steps and ETA

deliverables.description: Multi-select UI integration with confirmation flows
features: Edit mode toolbar with context-sensitive controls
Batch operation buttons (select all, cancel selected)

deliverables.description: Detailed execution progress with phase tracking and analytics
Complete analytics dashboard with Swift Charts
features: Four-tab analytics interface (Overview, Performance, Trends, Resources)
Summary metrics grid with efficiency scoring
Swift Charts integration for trend visualization

deliverables.description: Phase-based execution with detailed progress tracking
features: Real-time ETA calculations based on historical data

advanced_cancellation.multi_select_operations: Complete edit mode with selection state management
advanced_cancellation.confirmation_dialogs: Context-aware confirmation flows with destructive action styling
advanced_cancellation.batch_operations: Efficient batch cancellation with progress feedback
advanced_cancellation.accessibility: Full VoiceOver and Dynamic Type support

advanced_progress_tracking.eta_calculations: Real-time estimates based on historical data and current progress
advanced_progress_tracking.analytics_dashboard: Comprehensive analytics with Swift Charts visualization
advanced_progress_tracking.performance_metrics: Execution efficiency and resource utilization correlation
advanced_progress_tracking.trend_analysis: Historical data retention and pattern recognition

architecture_compliance.tca_patterns: Unidirectional data flow with comprehensive state management
architecture_compliance.swiftui_best_practices: Modern SwiftUI components with proper binding
architecture_compliance.ios_design_guidelines: Native iOS patterns with accessibility compliance
